name: User
description: The User class is used to describe users.  It is primarily used as a "container" class for the UserId aggregate class, as shown in Figure 16.

UserId.name: UserId
UserId.description: Identification of a user, as indicated by its type attribute (see Section 4.2.7.3.1).

ident.name: ident
ident.description: A unique identifier for the user; see Section 3.2.9.

category.name: category
category.description: The type of user represented.  The permitted values for this attribute are shown below.  The default value is "unknown". (See also Section 10.)

values.description: An operating system or device user
